title: Pecos National Historical Park: Laws & Policies
body: Laws & Policies          1916 Act to Establish a National Park Service (Organic Act)     Pecos National Historical Park, Draft General Management Plan (PDF)  Pecos National Historical Park - Glorieta Unit (PDF)    Pecos Public Law enactments, including 100-225 and 101-313  Pecos NHP Superintendent's Compendium A compilation of designations, closures, permit requirements and other restrictions made by the superintendent in addition to what is contained in the Code of Federal Regulations and other applicable federal statutes and regulations. Superintendent's Compendium Press Release  Superintendent's Compendium Full Text (PDF)    FIREARMS IN PARKS  As of February 22, 2010 a federal law allowed people who can legally possess firearms under applicable federal, state, and local laws, to legally possess firearms at this park. It is the responsibility of visitors to understand and comply with all applicable state, local, and federal firearms laws before entering this park. Please note that firearms are not allowed inside park buildings.
